name: Musicals Rule Trivia Game | Name the Musical | 10 Questions

questions.text: "Seeing is believing, and in my arms I see her."
options: Joseph and the Amazing Technicolor Dreamcoat
questions.explanation:
Aspects of Love.

	"Aspects of Love" is an Andrew Lloyd Webber musical.

questions.text: "Why did you do it, Johnny? Nobody agrees."
questions.explanation:
Assassins.

	This song is about John Wilkes Booth assassinating Lincoln.  "Assassins" is about all the people who killed a President or tried to kill a president.  It was written by Sondheim.

Girl Crazy.

	This was a George Gershwin musical.

questions.text: "I've trusted more than enough to last me until I die."
questions.explanation:
The Goodbye Girl.

	The original Broadway cast of "The Goodbye Girl" included Bernadette Peters and Martin Short.

questions.text: "This is the dawning of the age of Aquarius."
questions.explanation:
Hair.

	Although most people haven't seen "Hair" they usually know about the famous nude scene.  However, many times this is performed without the nude scene.

questions.text: "A secretary is not a toy, no my boy, not a toy."
questions.correct: How to Succeed in Business Without Really Trying
questions.explanation:
How to Succeed in Business Without Really Trying.

	"How to Succeed", "Guys & Dolls" and "Greenwillow" are all Frank Loesser musicals.  "The Happy Time" is a Kander and Ebb musical.

questions.text: "When a thing is wick it has a life about it."
questions.explanation:
The Secret Garden.

	Daisy Eagan played Mary Lennox in the Original Broadway cast of "The Secret Garden." As of that time, she was the youngest person to ever win a Tony for best actress.

questions.text: "Careful the things you say; children will listen."
questions.explanation:
Into the Woods.

	"Into the Woods" is a Stephen Sondheim musical.

questions.text: "Oh how I wish I weren't in love with Superman."
questions.correct: It's a Bird, It's a Plane, It's Superman
questions.explanation:
It's a Bird, It's a Plane, It's Superman.

	"It's a Bird, It's a Plane, It's Superman" is a Charles Strouse musical.

questions.text: "I'm freezing, that's because it's cold out."
options: Is There Life after High School?
questions.explanation:
She Loves Me.

	"She Loves Me" is the musical version of "Shop Around the Corner." The updated version of "Shop Around the Corner is the movie "You've Got Mail".
